text: The Shadow Play () is a 1992 Turkish fantasy drama movie directed by Yavuz Turgul and starring Şener Şen, Şevket Altuğ, Ülkü Duru, Metin Çekmez, Cevat Çapan. ==Other websites== * Category:1992 fantasy movies Category:1992 drama movies Category:Turkish movies Category:Movies directed by Yavuz Turgul
title: The Shadow Play
